name: Responsive Portfolio Website with Animations
shortDescription: Build a responsive personal portfolio website with modern UI and smooth animations using component-based architecture and utility-first styling
longDescription: Create a fully responsive portfolio site featuring sections for hero, about, projects, and contact. Implement reusable React components, Tailwind CSS for styling, and Framer Motion for page and element animations. Focus on layout, responsiveness, and clean UI without backend integration

name: Landing Page Builder with Reusable Components
shortDescription: Design a marketing landing page using reusable components and consistent design patterns.
longDescription: Develop a modern landing page with multiple sections such as hero, features, testimonials, and CTA. Emphasize reusable React components, responsive layouts with Tailwind CSS, and basic animations. Learn project structuring and component reusability

name: Theme Toggle Dashboard UI
shortDescription: Create a dashboard interface with light and dark theme switching.
longDescription: Build a simple dashboard layout that supports light and dark themes using state management. Implement theme persistence in the browser and responsive UI components. Focus on UI logic, state handling, and clean styling practices.

name: Animated Blog Listing Page
shortDescription: Build a blog listing UI with animated cards and navigation
longDescription: Create a blog-style interface displaying a list of articles using card components. Add hover and entry animations with Framer Motion and responsive grid layouts. Emphasize clean component structure and UI transitions.

name: Interactive Pricing Page UI
shortDescription: Design an interactive pricing page with toggles and highlights
longDescription: Develop a pricing page featuring multiple plans, a monthly yearly toggle, and highlighted popular plans. Use React state for interactions and Tailwind CSS for layout and responsiveness. Focus on UI logic and presentation

name: Form Validation UI with Modern Styling
shortDescription: Create a styled form interface with client-side validation
longDescription: Build a contact or signup form with input validation and error handling. Use controlled components in React and Tailwind CSS for styling. Focus on form UX, accessibility basics, and clean UI feedback.

name: Static E-commerce Product Page
shortDescription: Design a product detail page similar to an e-commerce website.
longDescription: Create a product page featuring image gallery layout, product details, pricing, and action buttons. Emphasize responsive design, reusable UI components, and clean styling without backend logic.

name: Navigation Menu and Layout System
shortDescription: Build a responsive navigation bar and layout system.
longDescription: Develop a reusable navigation bar with mobile menu support and a consistent layout wrapper. Focus on responsive behavior, accessibility basics, and clean component structure using Tailwind CSS

name: Animated Testimonials Section
shortDescription: Create an animated testimonials section for marketing sites.
longDescription: Build a testimonials carousel or grid with subtle animations and transitions. Use Framer Motion for entry effects and Tailwind CSS for layout. Focus on UI polish and animation timing.

name: 404 and Error Pages Collection

longDescription: Create a set of custom error pages including 404 and generic error states. Use creative layouts, responsive design, and simple animations to enhance user experience.

name: Responsive Personal Portfolio UI
